forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Lows overnight in the upper 60s.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low near 20C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 68F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning followed by isolated thunderstorms during the afternoon. High 27C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy...isolated thunderstorms developing during the afternoon. High 81F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 25C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 77F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with showers and thundershowers, mainly during the evening. Low 18C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with showers and thundershowers, mainly during the evening. Low 64F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 27C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High around 80F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partial cloudiness early, with scattered showers and thunderstorms later during the night. Low 19C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy with late night showers or thunderstorms. Low 66F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
